item.title: the COWL
item.content:encoded:
this boots + cowl is useless.

why u need to play waste mission if u can do another high mission ?

the only reason for this thing is eye of the storm bloodline.

Obtain Cowl

Perhaps the most important item after you complete Wasteland will be your cowl. Your cowl powers up your Storm's power later on for the Eye of the Storm bloodline. The better the cowl, the more powerful your storm. However, any cowl will do for now in order to progress.
